author: Isabel Ling
title: Architects and engineers are 3D printing medical gear during pandemic
description: Universities are using their 3D printers to produce key parts of personal protective equipment for front line health care workers.
content: On college campuses, 3D printers have become emergency producers of masks, visors, and other protective gear as hospitals across the world face shortages. At Cornell University, production of visors began soon after Kirsten Petersen, an associate professor in… [+4936 chars]
